item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 2, 2024 at 2:45 AM UTC
item.description:

2. Apple acquires Pixelmator (847 points | 450 comments)
3. RCE Vulnerability in QBittorrent (115 points | 20 comments)

6. Direct Sockets API in Chrome 131 (27 points | 8 comments)
7. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (November 2024) (277 points | 263 comments)
8. Letters by Oliver Sacks review – science, sex and motorcycles (13 points | discuss)
9. Nvidia to join Dow Jones Industrial Average, replacing Intel (141 points | 55 comments)
10. Alexander the Great's tunic identified in royal tomb at Vergina? (257 points | 132 comments)

27. Math and puzzle fans find magic in Martin Gardner's legacy (70 points | 28 comments)
28. The Dual Nature of Events in Event-Driven Architecture (69 points | 29 comments)
29. AMD Open-Source 1B OLMo Language Models (39 points | 3 comments)
30. Oasis: A Universe in a Transformer (205 points | 74 comments)
